rules.text: Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.
Do not use slurs or discriminatory or hateful jokes and language, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia; including tone policing or critiquing lived experience.
Add content warnings to sensitive content (e.x. nudity, violence)
Do not harass anyone, post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”), or incite violence against anyone.
Do not post in bad faith, engage in name-calling, or ad hominem attacks. Criticize ideas, not people.
Do not post spam (e.x. a post with only a link or an image) or promote crypto-related content such as cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
Follow the community code of conduct: https://hub.sfba.social/code-of-conduct  Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally. Be nice and have fun!
